Player History
Drafted in 26th round, 303rd overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off John Mebane (WAS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2019, off Robert Scherer (WAS)...
Injured on 4/17/2019 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2019, hitting .583 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/1/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $656,000 per year...
